name: Hologram 3D Hoverboard Joke
description:
Hologram 3D hoverboard joke - this is a game simulation application hoverboard. You love to ride a hoverboard? I dreamed of a simulator on your phone? Try our unique game. For a more realistic effect, the camera is used. Manage hoverboards directly on the phone with your fingers. Come and play myself - show your friends and family. The game is fully beslpatnye!
ATTENTION! The game was created for fun and jokes and is not at risk!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us feedback and evaluation, and if you like it, we'll do even better with the new updates!
